title: Heavy rains in Hyderabad; many areas report waterlogging - Times of India
content:
1. Heavy rains in Hyderabad; many areas report waterlogging  Times of India
  2. Hyderabad witnesses sudden thundershowers, heavy rainfall  The News Minute
  3. Watch: Boats Out On Hyderabad Roads As Heavy Rain Leads To Waterlogging  NDTV
  4. Heavy Rains Sink Hyderabad: Roads Water Logged, Power Lines Disrupted | Hyderabad News Today  India Today
  5. Heavy rains lash parts of Hyderabad; thundershowers likely in Telangana  The Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Early morning showers in Hyderabad brought respite from heat for residents. However, in many areas it also resulted in waterlogging. Some areas of the city reported power cuts. In Hyderabad, Seethafalmandi near Secunderabad, Bansilalpet and West Marredpally received the heaviest showers. Some other cities in Telangana and Andhra Pradesh too received rainfall.
